dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4095 IH: To amend the charter of the Gold Star Wives of America to remove the restriction on the federally chartered corporation, and directors and officers of the corporation, attempting to influence legislation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the charter of the Gold Star Wives of America to remove the restriction on the federally chartered corporation, and directors and officers of the corporation, attempting to influence legislation.

section.header: Revision of Federal charter restrictions on Gold Star Wives of America
section.text: Section 80507 of title 36, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (c) and (d) as subsections (b) and (c), respectively.
